    • Uses of Collection in org.wso2.carbon.repository.api

      Methods in org.wso2.carbon.repository.api that return Collection 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Collection Repository.executeQuery(String path, Map<?,?> parameters)
      Executes a custom query which lives at the given path in the Registry.
      Collection Repository.get(String path, int start, int num)
      Returns the Collection at the given path, with the specified number of content starting from specified location
      Collection Repository.newCollection()
      Creates a new collection.
      Collection RepositoryService.newCollection(String[] paths)
      Creates a new Collection instance with the Resources with given paths
      Collection Repository.searchContent(String keywords)
      Search the content of resources

      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CollectionImpl
      The default registry implementation of the Collection interface.
      class  CollectionVersionImpl
      Implementation of CollectionImpl, Instance of this class is returned when requested for an early version of some collection.
